item.description: I'm sorry for the very late notice ~ I only received word from Will at 8 AM this (SAT!) morning! Will Tuttle, PhD and author of the #1 Bestseller in 2010 on amazon.com, "The World Peace Diet" will be giving a presentation at the Black Swan Inn in Tilton tomorrow (7/22) morning from 10-11 AM. Vegan BBQ/potluck at Tilton Island Park, also tomorrow, from 1:00-4:00 PM. Please RSVP 729-0248. Sunday night accommodations at the BSI at a special rate of $55 pp/including tax, plus vegan breakfast on Monday morning at 10:00 AM for an additional $10. Call for reservations 630-6155
item.name: Dr. Will Tuttle, author, "The World Peace Diet" + Vegan BBQ/Potluck
